name: APD & Dyslexia Gaming Simulation
description: I wanted to make a text game that simulated what it's like to be a livestreamer that has Dyslexia and Auditory Processing Disorder. In the game, you play a livestreamer working through their day preparing to livestream a new game.  This game walks you through a few scenarios from checking your social media in the morning, to finding viable livestreams, to setting up a game to play.
